What are the key components of a deceptive act?

What are the key components of a deceptive act?

The elements of a deceptive act are: (1) a false statement of fact; (2) made with knowledge of its falsity; (3) with the intent to induce another to act or refrain from acting; (4) upon which the other justifiably relies; and (5) which causes injury to the other.
